summary: Over the 6‑hour window winds were strong and steady (mean ~14.24, std ~1.46) with intermittent gusts to 27.4, and temperatures remained elevated (mean ~67.6). Power stayed consistently high (mean ~0.96) with low variability and a persistent positive residual (~0.10); rotor speed was tightly held (very low std) while generator speed showed noticeably more fluctuation. Pitch averaged about 8° and average yaw misalignment was ~2.2°, and the operational status was non‑normal for the entire period.
